2:
Praise him for his mighty acts;\q praise him for his surpassing greatness.


\q
3:
Praise him with the blast of the horn;\q praise him with lute and harp.
\q
4:
Praise him with tambourines and dancing;\q praise him with stringed instruments and wind instruments.
\q
5:
Praise him with loud cymbals;\q praise him with high sounding cymbals.


\q
6: Let everything that has breath praise Yahweh.\q Praise Yahweh.
